segments.text: I notice the water overflowing from the sink, creating a large puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's surprising how the woman doesn't seem to notice it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just standing there, drying a plate with a dish towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children behind her are being so mischievous, climbing on the stool to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit disgusted seeing the water spill all over the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching his arm to grab a cookie, completely ignoring the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is right there, waiting for him to hand her a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman needs to turn around and see what's happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so calm and tidy, unlike the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she realizes what's going on before someone gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR
